catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 213
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson burke Foundation
description: unsigned; thick field of barley painted against a gold leaf background
medium: Ink, color, and silver on gilded paper
text: A field of barley in spring. With its malachite green stalks and shell white grain, the young barley sways in the breeze, creating a gentle visual rhythm across a ground of silver (now oxidized and darkened). The edge of the field undulates like a beach across the length of screen, giving way to an expanse of gold foil in the upper one-third of the painting.
title: Barley Field
